amendment.description: To avert the waiving of liability for a utility whose line clearing work ignites a wildfire.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3365 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3365 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4714, S4716; text: CR S4716) To avert the waiving of liability for a utility whose line clearing work ignites a wildfire.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3365 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3365 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 3224.
